website_summaries.verdict: The AM06 is an impressive spectacle to behold -- but it's still just a desk fan. For such an expensive device, we wish that it doubled as a space heater, like Dyson's AM05, or featured a more noticeable bump in performance. It doesn't, and that makes it difficult to recommend.
pros: With a quieter, more efficient design that sacrifices none of the original's unique appeal, the Dyson AM06 is about as luxurious as desk fans get
cons: At $299, it's as expensive as desk fans get, too --- by quite a bit
Also, with basically no controls on the unit aside from the on/off button, you'd better hope you don't lose the remote

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: When I pay full price, I expect factory fresh, untouched by human hands product. This was clearly a return. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Unimpressed. For the price, I expected more air flow. I sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great but try to find a sale
customer_reviews.text: Quality fan, The steady non choppy airflow is fantastic like a real breeze in the house. This fan may not be good if you have extremely sensitive professional level hearing as the motor and swivel sounds in the dead of night can sometimes sound similar to the swarm of scarab beetles from the mummy movies especially above level 4. This is negligable most of the time but I have to turn it off some nights because of the sound. It is a great form and design for functionality so will have to see how the performance continues.
customer_reviews.author: Audiosmith

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand any noise while trying to get to sleep. This fan is pricey, but I keep it on a low setting on my night stand and it's super quiet and I stay super cool!
customer_reviews.author: C.C. Mel

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This fan is by far the best small fan I have ever owned! You can set the volume of air you want very precisely and for how long you want it on (timer). Probably the greatest quality of this fan is how QUIET it is; even at medium speed you barely hear it. The remote control conveniently adheres magnetically to the top of the fan, so you never loose it! (Ugh, I hate that!) Then, add in that you can make it rotate and what more could you want! This fan is the best value for the money; it is worth EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not sold directly from Dyson US.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a refurbished unit from Canada (confirmed that unit is from Canada when it was registered online with Dyson). Noticeable scuffs and scrapes on the pivoting unit base. Deciding whether or not to return the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Although it looks really nice, the top part feels cheap for the price
customer_reviews.text: overall it's a lot quieter than my vornado, but the noise has a higher pitch. The led brightness is not a problem, it's really dim and doesn't bother me at all. Although it looks really nice, the top part feels cheap for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong - this product looks great. But when we received it, we noticed it made a clicking sound every time it oscillated to the left. After calling Dyson customer service, they let us know we needed to replace it. So we replaced it with the same model and this time... it makes a clicking sound when oscillating to the right. It's not worth the $272 it costs us, and we will be returning this one too.
customer_reviews.author: James Furnival

customer_reviews.title: Worth the splurge!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly remarkable. I cannot Have noise in my home office. We were having a sweltering summer and i had to keep my ceiling fan off. A standing fan was too loud. A desk top fan was too loud, but this fan is stellar. I can place it high and rotate to cool down an entire small room or keep it stationary on the floor to blow directly on me. Most efficient fan I’ve ever owned, 10 speeds, and it’s quietest fan I’ve ever owned. Looks cool too. Remote is small- really small so keep it out of reach of pets- even cats, it works perfectly. Price point is a little high or I’d buy more for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Yet another Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Your paying for a name and nothing else.
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money this item cost you will be very disappointed by how much airflow you get ... I have a 20$ fan that blows more air in s room than this over priced hair dryer... sure its quiet but it's also quiet with no fan because the air flow is ab the same. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Heavy D

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as a $12 wallmart fan
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, does not really have a "cooling" feature. It's a sub-par fan, far weaker than a standard plastic $12 fan I got from Wallmart
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: I’m Blown Away by this Dyson Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Dyson fan! Was delivered on the same day that I purchased it. Looks and works fantastic. I’ve always wanted one of these fans and finally decided to buy one. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Crispy63

customer_reviews.title: Not enough air flow
customer_reviews.text: This is good for office or a small place. I have a living room of 10x10 this isn’t enough flow of air. I stayed with my wind tunnel that blows more air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer loyal

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: After posting a review about loud buzzing, I tried the fan several more times and the buzzing has stopped! I don't know if there is a break-in period that isn't mentioned in the user manual (if there is, the manual should warn you) or if some debris in the machine worked its way out. But for now, the fan is working as advertised. I am raising my stars to 4 for the time being. I can't go to 5 stars, because I am not confident that the buzzing won't be back with a vengence any day now.
customer_reviews.author: Just another opinion

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: In my humble opinion the housing is NOT cheap plastic as other reviewers have opined, and I'm very hard to please when it comes to quality. The noise level is not at all loud. It is like "white noise" as other reviewers have opined. I actually like the subtle white noise when going to bed. It's much quieter than the Vernardo fan which I replaced with this Dyson. I generally set the air flow level at 4 or 5 for bedtime and it works great. i'm very happy with this purchase, and would purchase it again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: jcass

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this fan. Design and technology are first rate, but the quality is not there. It IS very quiet - impressive for the amount of air it pushes. BUT, the oscillation is the major weak link. My unit wobbles and makes nosies while in motion. Called Dyson and they said let it break in 3 days. OK, after a week it's no better and worse depending on where I place it. So unfortunately, it's being returned as defective. The negative reviews on here appear to be accurate!
customer_reviews.author: john watson

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong fan even on the highest setting
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and safe for pets and kids but I'm not sure if it's worth the high price tag since it isn't strong. On level 10 it feels like it's blowing soft air at you. Compared to a normal fan maybe it's equal to level 2 out of 10. It seems to work more like a small fan on your desk. I think because of the technology it attracts dust. There's a lot of dust that will stick to the body of the fan and within the circle. Within a week it was bad.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fujikawa

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the bedroom. Use it about 5 months of the year - it is small enough to circulate air and is quite silent until you get to the higher settings. Even then, the noise is very manageable for me (I have thrown out several fans due to the noise) Yes, I would buy it again and yes, it is worth the price to me.
customer_reviews.author: GenuineImitation

customer_reviews.title: Cools the air, but not that silent
customer_reviews.text: This Dyson certainly does cool the air, much more that my conventional and tower fans do. It looks nice, but it's certainly not silent. Yes, if the speed is set to 5 of under you really don;t notice the sound. But 6 and up definitely sound similar to any other fan. $272 is a steep price to pay, but it's been saving me in my home office during this California heatwave.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Strenk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this fan 10 stars I certainly would. I run a fan every night while I sleep. I’m so pleased with this fan. Unlike other fans that has to be taken apart to clean 🙄 The Dyson blameless fan is super easy to clean, just wipe the inside of the fan with a clean dry cloth and vacuum the air inlet filter on the base of the fan. It’s that easy!! Great product. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: great for a few months, then degrades.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I bought it a few months ago. It just started making a strange grinding sound when it's on though, even at lowest speed. This keeps me from sleeping. If you get a dyson, one reason why is the silence. Not anymore, though... disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FAN!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is quiet and I use it in my bedroom in case I get hot during the night (or when I nap during the day). I highly recommend this product. I also purchased the tall one for my living room and love that one too.
customer_reviews.author: Lovie Lanz

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap solution to fans but it is quiet and that makes a difference. Safely portable and light, you can change places and rooms. You do need to recall that it does not have manual adjustments, only with teh remote. It is magnetically held on the top of the fan to not lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Archaeologist

customer_reviews.title: BUY BUY BUY Dyson Fan for Low Price
customer_reviews.text: Great fan - best price on the market for a Dyson Cool fan. It is loud when you first turn it on but once it gets going it’s quiet forever! The fan being loud is not a problem. I see a lot about a “night light”in the reviews as well but the numbers are not that bright at night. GREAT LOOK AND GREAT POWER!
customer_reviews.author: vicktor_ious

customer_reviews.title: Small Apartment Cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely pretty fan that works wonderfully during the summer in NYC! Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Maria F.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase this style, irritating clicking noises when rotating!
customer_reviews.text: Although you pay a premium for this fan it is not up to par. Style and function are ok but there is a serious clicking noise when it oscillates, this can be very irritating, wish I still had the box so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Crown

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It's very quiet on the low level
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's very quiet on the low level. There will be sound of the high level but not very loud, it's till good to me. I will purchase the floor one in the near future. Bottom line of this, my money is well worth spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great fan! Mine has clicking noise so I don't use oscillation.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second dyson purchase, and I have to say they make a very well put together product. Unfortunately, the damn thing is just not user serviceable, which dings it a few stars in my book. Mine has a clicking noise every time the fan oscillates, and I'm fairly sensitive to noises so it is something where I said to myself "well, I'm not using oscillation now". I tried following instructions found on youtube (see Unsharpen's video on trying to fix it), but got to the same point as them and said screw it, it's still a good fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This Fan is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom is super hot all year around and I went ahead and bought this fan hoping it would cool things off a bit. It has exceeded my expectations and more! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: isaiahsmomterey

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love how quiet the fan is. I don’t have to worry about blades that can break. The price is a little high but the quality is good. I’m thinking my next one I will buy with the WiFi to use with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: alyndsay

customer_reviews.title: Not loud and perfect for video conferences
customer_reviews.text: The noise level is not loud. Over a video conference people don't hear it so during these days of working from home – it's perfect. We don't use AC and this unit saves a lot of electricity!
customer_reviews.author: DBN

customer_reviews.title: Best contemporary bladeless room fan the really cools.
customer_reviews.text: Love this quiet, contemporary fan. Bought to use in kitchen on counter when a/c not really needed. But it can be used in any room. Only wish it was cordless. But LOVE that it oscillates And has a small remote control.
customer_reviews.author: David Y Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fan
customer_reviews.text: Once you buy one of these you’ll never want to go back to the old fans. My mom with COPD loves this fan because the remote is so helpful for her. She can adjust the levels and turn it on and off without having to get up. Plus it’s so quiet and blows air softly. It’s truly perfect for her!
customer_reviews.author: ASE

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Dyson Product
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several Dyson vacuums and decided to splurge on this fan. It looks and works GREAT and is very quiet and making the remote magnetic and stick to the device is genius.
customer_reviews.author: darryl

customer_reviews.title: Brownie points
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife to keep cool while getting dressed. Great for close up use. Right silent but much quieter than a blade fan pushing same amount of air. Variable speeds, oscillating, tilt. Cool little extras like a magnet to keep the remote handy. Not sure a $200 fan is smart but I am proud of it and got brownie points with wife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable, fun, and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This leaves to its expectations. Noisy level is adequate. If you put it on the max then you can hear it but nothing uncontrollable. I have it to complement the room and use it in medium to medium low which is perfect in conjunction with AC.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Arizona and my body temperature always runs warmer than others. This fan made a huge difference in my hot office! AND, it’s quiet enough for me to take conference calls without it sounding like a wind tunnel. I did read the reviews about the led light being bright at night if you use as a bed side fan but this doesn’t bother me at all. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Pike

customer_reviews.title: Seller, DataVision Computer Video, only ensures product will work correctly for 30 days
customer_reviews.text: The fan is great, when its working properly. Unfortunately our fan makes noise when oscillating left and right. Its important to note that the seller, DataVision Computer Video, only ensures the product will work correctly for 30 days. I reached out to them regarding the noise a little less than 90 days after purchase and they suggested I contact Dyson directly. The seller did not provide tips to resolve the issue or contact information for Dyson. I've now registered the item on Dyson.com and reached out to their customer support. Pending a response.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed with Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied with this fan. Never disappointed in Dyson products. Good design, easy to clean and super strong air flow. Am looking to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: I would like to buy it earlier
customer_reviews.text: The only regret thing is that I should buy it earlier. The level 1 is very suitable for sleep at night. Only little noise, I even can't hear it. When I am not home, I still leave it open, since it will accelerate air circulation in the apartment. After coming back, it is totally fresh air. And also, the product is easily to put in box, I can bring it anywhere when I want to move to new apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quiet fan for my home office and this is perfect. I can finally hear myself on the phone again. It gets a little noisy above the 4 setting but I’ve never needed it to be that high. Worth the price. Even on 90 degree days this thing beats the heat. I did leave it on overnight by accident because it’s so quiet, but take that as a compliment for the noise level in spite of my own stupidity.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Average!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of using, it will not swing from side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Elan Christian Bulalhog

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: While Dyson fans seem so expensive overall the features add value. It's very quiet and moves air well. It is bigger than I expected. It is not "subtle" in appearance.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan does it all, tilts, oscillates, moves the air, and keeps kids safe. This was a birthday gift for my husband and he loves it! Perfect size for our bedroom and it looks cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Best. Fan. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best fan ever. I will never buy another style. I use this in my bedroom and it’s perfect! I wanted one for years but didn’t want to spend the money. Glad I finally pulled the trigger
customer_reviews.author: Megan Elliott

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Dyson. What would you buy anything else?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted a Dyson fan. With a good sale price, I finally own one! Looks attractive on my night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: not enough bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: if you want a grate looking table decoration its grate
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: A very quite fan and 10 levels of blowing force.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this fan is very quiet and that it's possible to fine tune the speed or blowing force. The fan is also not too large. The diameter of the outer edge of the circle is just about 12".
customer_reviews.author: Victoria R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Not much to dislike about this product. Finally pulled the trigger and got one for south Florida summer weather. It’s easy to set up and fits perfect on my table stand. Very impressed with my purchase. Blows very nice and quite feels really “cool”
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Did not live up to advertisements
customer_reviews.text: I was using this product in my bedroom and the light on it was too bright and it did creat enough wind to keep my room closed. The price is too expensive for this Dyson product.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this fan because I need an adjustable-speed fan to sit near my head due to frequent hot flashes. It has 10 speeds and is very quiet. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as quiet running as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It works. It is a 10 speed fan.We use it mainly at night in our bedroom where it is very quiet. It is a little noisier than I expected. I read some reviews where the person said they couldn't hear the fan until they had the speed on 5, I however can hear it on #2.
customer_reviews.author: Flys4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Soooo quiet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent air flow with virtually no sound. Remote makes it easy to adjust during night
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This fan started making noise writhin a couple months of purchase but it's too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: KrisG

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: A great fan that is not very noisy and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient cool
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It's quiet and cools well. The remote also works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered this for my bedside table and am very pleased. I have been having a little trouble w ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my bedside table and am very pleased. I have been having a little trouble w arthritis in my hand and was having difficulties turning on my old fan. Another thing I love is small children won’t b hurting their fingers when visiting and being near my fan!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Akard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, and is really quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. You cannot hear it unless using top speed. I like the remote, but being older I have a difficulty seeing the buttons. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Though more expensive than any similar fan that I researched, this one delivers better than any fan I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Fan Is Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great fan. Everything as expected! Delivered as promised and as described.
customer_reviews.author: markwtn

customer_reviews.title: Quiet as a mouse!
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet and powerful too! It is perfect t fir my husbands office , thx!
customer_reviews.author: Chrome Zone

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, EASY to clean!!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this product. Got a great daily deal, wish I could only use this style fan!!
customer_reviews.author: Marval

customer_reviews.title: Good if you like a stationary fan
customer_reviews.text: Alot a wind at the highest setting. Unfortunately it's stationary, you can angle it up or down but you can get it to oscillate.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Sulley

customer_reviews.title: It's alot of money but well worth not having revolving blades like the old fashioned type fans
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves, loves, loves this for his garage work area. It gets hot in the garage while he is at his workbench and this does the trick. It's alot of money but well worth not having revolving blades like the old fashioned type fans. Perfect size to keep on workbench.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie B

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This fan is unbelievably quiet at low speeds with minimal noise at higher speeds. Works amazingly in my apartment without an air conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Rue-Stange

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.text: The best fan that I’ve ever used! Airflow is good for me. Druring night, I just need the level 5(out of 10). I bought it is just because of my 2 years old son. Thus the bladeless design is not dangerous to him.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great either
customer_reviews.text: I'm somewhat disappointed with my purchase. I replaced my old desktop fan (blade) in my bedroom with this model Dyson, thinking this would circulate the air better. It's not bad, but at its highest setting (10) it's no stronger than my medium setting on my old 3 speed desktop fan. The only button on the fan is an "On/Off" button. If you lose the remote which has all the other functions on it you're screwed. Plus at the highest setting a al "white noise" can be heard. It doesn't bother me but it might bother other people. I do enjoy the fan, though I would not buy one again because I don't think this is worth $300.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Best fan EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best fan I have ever had. So great I got another one for my home office. I never knew a fan could be so quiet. Settings 1-3 are whisper quiet with a gentle breeze. The higher settings give you some serious cooling. I never thought I would pay this much for a table fan, but it is totally justified considering the quality.
customer_reviews.author: John Errera

customer_reviews.title: It's kid proof
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. It doesn't keep a lot of noise. It's kid proof.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Uptigrow

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the oscillating function cools the whole room
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the oscillating function cools the whole room! The remote control is very useful. It is fairly quiet unless turned up on high. I would recommend this fan to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RGold

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but high quality bladeless fan.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but high quality bladeless fan. I don't regret the purchase. It keeps my room nice and cool, and course cleaning is not a hassle like conventional blade fans.
customer_reviews.author: Nachon

customer_reviews.title: When u sleep your body temp drops the time is good for that
customer_reviews.text: Perfection it does all the things I want and need remote levels timer strong enough current
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I love the timer and the easy cleaning of this fan
customer_reviews.text: I have had this fan for over a year and I will not go back to a fan with blades ever again! I love the timer and the easy cleaning of this fan. It’s a great fan and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Monica G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 300.00
customer_reviews.text: In the end this is just a fan. It works well but so do many other name brands that are much less money!
customer_reviews.author: marianne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent styling
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this fan. I first saw one in a Swiss hotel, and immediately made a point of buying one. While expensive, the top-rate design and engineering justify having one.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Ahern

customer_reviews.title: Small desk fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan....just what I needed and wanted for my Master Bathroom...plenty of velocity!!
customer_reviews.author: randall sparks

customer_reviews.title: Top quality,,super quiet ,,remote control,,as always,,dyson works very well ,
customer_reviews.text: What can i say its a dyson ,,top quality,,quiet ,nice remote control,,,best fan i ever had ,
customer_reviews.author: christopher teed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & functional!!
customer_reviews.text: We like everything about our Dyson bladeless fan. Sleek, modern cooling is fantastic. Hadn’t used heating yet. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Would have liked to pay less for it, but it is a Dyson.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this purchase. Not loud and works wonderfully for our room.
customer_reviews.author: Belen C. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is the accumulation of dust on the intake. The black color makes it very noticeable but it’s worth it. Great fan!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lasarte

customer_reviews.title: Great, small, quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: This is already the second fan we bought. Our kids love them as it allows them to keep cool while studying at home. They are quieter and more efficient compared to air conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: Holger Tamm

customer_reviews.title: Dyson good product, but over priced
customer_reviews.text: Great product I love the design, but a bit pricey just for a fan
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBestFriend

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Smooth!
customer_reviews.text: My room gets super hot in summer, so I was looking for a cool down. This tower fan is exactly what I needed in my room. Not only is it sleek and modern looking, it functionally outperforms any other fan that I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now to end the noise debate.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So we'll worth the money. Finally a fan I can use at night and it does not disturb my husband. I wish I had taken the plunge on a splurge price for a fan so much earlier. It would have eliminated the fan noise arguments. Lastly, although I read and mentally understood the size of the fan, I really did not fully realize how large it would be on my bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Big breeze in a small package
customer_reviews.text: This fam works great! Produces a nice breeze with no blades for grandchildren to mess with. Just wipe clean
customer_reviews.author: Mary Francis

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, quiet, works well
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It works well, is quiet (my husband no longer complains about how loud my fan is!), and it’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice airflow and quiet. I am saving to buy a floor model for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: BlownItem

customer_reviews.title: The design of the product is very modern.
customer_reviews.text: The product cools a large area (living room) and is extremely quiet. The modern design of the product fits well in a modern apartment. It is a great improvement over old-style fans. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L. Ottley

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fan! Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan! Quiet, efficient, attractive, moves air wonderfully with lots of variations of flow available. Oscillates and tilts for air flow direction changes. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: DCJ

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, quiet air flow
customer_reviews.text: This is our second "fan" that we've purchased from Dyson. The air flow is so smooth and the unit is much quieter than a regular fan. We use on in our bedroom in our motorhome and one in our living room in our coach. Both work beautifully. AND, they're attractive.
customer_reviews.author: WeAreUs

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Wish I would’ve gotten the filtered dyson
customer_reviews.text: Great power. And I love the rotating option. Only regret is not getting the one that filters air
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Whisper Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This fan is excellent. I can turn it up to its highest setting and Van barely hear it 4 feet from me. I have two Dyson fans now, this one and the headset cool, this is the quieter of the two by fast. I would recommend this fan to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Perry

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fan. I have it on my desk at ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan. I have it on my desk at work, and it is silent compared to my old fan that sounded like it had a V-8. And at least twice a day, I get comments or people putting their hand in the middle of it and saying it's amazing. Be prepared to have random people, including the "higher ups" to come by your desk for comments.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Southwick

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Air Multiplier AMO6 Table Fan, 10 inches, white
customer_reviews.text: What price happiness! This is a fantastic fan! A little pricey, but its quiet, unique and pretty in my bedroom. I love the remote control and have used the fan every night since receiving it. You won't be disappointed. Its easy to clean too - just wipe it off!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Fan
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan with great circulation. Adds a touch of elegance to an otherwise unattractive unit. I’ve had one for 7 years and never an issue so I bought one for my sons for their apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Adria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, consistent air flow. I use a fan ...
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, consistent air flow. I use a fan every night and the Dyson replace my typical blade fan. It has ten speed settings and I use speed setting 2.
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fan - love the quiet but efficient. Much more powerful than it appears.
customer_reviews.author: Kskorman

customer_reviews.title: Cool future fan
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fan. I feel like for the amount I spent it should have an ac function, idk if that exists yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the sleek look of this fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the sleek look of this fan, and I love the fact that it won't be blowing around nasty dust in my bedroom. However, it doesn't put out as much air as I was expecting from a Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: I love these dyson fans
customer_reviews.text: I love these dyson fans. They don't have any visible blades to clean so they are way to keep clean. 10 options for low to high air flow speed. The bast fan I've owned. It's also quieter than a normal fan with visible fan blades.
customer_reviews.author: twinz59

product_meta.title: Dyson Air Multiplier AM06 Table Fan, 10 Inches, White/Silver
product_meta.description:
Color:White/Silver| Style:Fan

The Dyson Air Multiplier AM06 10-Inch Table Fan works very differently from conventional fans. It uses Air Multiplier technology to draw in air and amplify it 15 times, projecting smooth, quiet, powerful, high-velocity airflow without the use of blades.



Features:

 * Air Multiplier Technology: Dyson fans use patented Air Multiplier technology to create a powerful stream of uninterrupted airflow without fast-spinning blades making it safe for children, pets and during cleaning
 * Remote Control: With 10 precise airflow settings, sleep timer, on/off and oscillation control. Curved and magnetized to store neatly on the machine.
 * Quieter: Streamlined air channels for reduced airflow turbulence make the AM06 75% quieter than AM01
 * Oscillation Control: Airflow can be directed around a room – one touch for smooth oscillation.
 * Easy Tilt: Pivots on its own center of gravity to direct cool air where you need it.
 * Bladeless: Dyson fans don't have any fast spinning blades so they are safe.
 * Sleep Timer: Fan can be programmed to turn off after pre-set intervals ranging from 15 minutes to 9 hours.
 * Easy to Clean: No awkward safety grilles or blades that would make it difficult to clean.
 * Warranty: 2 year parts & labor warranty when purchased from an authorized reseller.
feature_bullets: Dyson fans use patented Air Multiplier technology to create a powerful stream of uninterrupted airflow without fast-spinning blades making it safe for children, pets and during cleaning
2 year parts & labor warranty when purchased from an authorized reseller
Dyson fans are quiet and powerful while being safe and easy to clean
Features include sleep timer which can be programmed to turn off after preset intervals ranging from 15 minutes to nine hours
Remote control has the choice of10 precise airflow settings. The remote is curved and magnetized to store neatly on the machine

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
